name: Zorpocalypse
description:
Zorpocalypse is a Third-Person, Survival, Horde game using different game mechanics in conjunction with each other to defend your home. The game combines cute and vibrant environments, with wave defence gameplay to provide a comedic and casual experience for our audience. We expect our game to resonate with a younger demographic, aiming for 7 years and above.

Mouse and Keyboard controls.
PC.
